name: Construct3 Game Prototype
description:
To play with this game, players will uses Arrow Keys:

The “UP” key represents the “Jump” motion; the “DOWN” key represents the “Fall” motion; the “LEFT” key represents the “Turning Left” motion; the “RIGHT” key represents the “Turning Right” motion. 

To avoid the demons (the bats in the game), the player needs to avoid them by jumping away from them (using the “UP” key). If getting contact with a bat, the player’s score will be deducted 10 points. To collect the hearts, the player just needs to walk through the hearts and there will be 10 points rewarded for obtaining each heart.
